short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays OpenCheck identity verification on profiles and timelines on twitter.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows OpenCheck identity verification information on Twitter accounts and timelines on twitter.com. OpenCheck uses a combination of Wikidata and community-based, web-of-trust identity verifications.
